issue.body:

Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/maetjqty4iswg8s80sko0ocgc08ok4kddr1182z23s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.1 (5226) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.cloudflare.com/dns-query`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
AdGuard Experimental

Language-specific:
List-KR Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `tinyShield (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://slickdeals.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fslickdeals.net%2F) Other extensions used: | `Adguard windows app, Adguard chrome extension, windows defender` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.1+%285226%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.5.227&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.cloudflare.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=tinyShield%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fnpm%252F%2540filteringdev%252Ftinyshield%2540latest%252Fdist%252FtinyShield.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fslickdeals.net%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
